questions.question: 2 painters finish a wall in 4 hours. How long would 1 painter take?
questions.hint: If you have fewer workers, does the job take more or less time?

questions.question: A car travels 60 miles in 1 hour. How far in 3 hours?
A tap fills a bucket in 10 minutes. How long to fill 5 buckets?
questions.hint: Same tap, more buckets. Multiply the time by the number of buckets.

questions.hint: Double the helpers means the job gets done in...
